title: Forbidden Sins
description: Falling is easy.Landing hurts.When their relationship is threatened by the reckless crime committed against the Lotus Queen, the heightened emotions drive the unholy trinity to take desperate measures.With their world turned upside down, Sal, Deacon, and Iris attempt to learn the new shape of their love as revenge, rage, and baby Raniero take center stage. But nothing is the same. Feelings are silenced. Hearts are broken. Damage is done.Can they avoid the fatal crash, or is it too late to save the romance they once shared?
author: Kailee Reese Samuels
